author.persName: Muhammad Qasim b. Hajji Muhammad Kashani (Sururi).

msItem.title: Majma' al-furs.
msItem.note: The initial entry is written on a page inserted in the Library copy of Codrington, after p. 544, now loose. F1a: Note of presentation by Khan Bahadur Mirza Muhammad Folio 341b: note of possession of Muhammad b. Qutb Din. A Persian dictionary. The first edition of the work. Headings and punctuation in red. Author's poetical name is 'Sururi'.

handNote.persName: Isma'il b. Hilal(-i?) Tahir(-i?) Rida-yi Bihzad Gallahdari

bindingDesc.p: Quite recent green half-leather binding with tooling on spine.

acquisition.p: Presented by Khan Bahadur Mirza Muhammad of Basra, 26 March 1924.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
